EmailTemplate.name: 18-Bus @ Cloud Spd-Peering Engineering-Email-NFD20Emailers-T003LV.Email - Save t
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the date! Nokia peering livestream at NFD20
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Save the date! Peering livestream at NFD20 Take control of your peering edge Join our livestream on February 13 at 4pm - 6pm PST Join Nokia technical experts at Networking Field Day 20 <[[https://techfieldday.com/event/nfd20/]]> to learn how advanced network analytics, automated peering engineering and DDoS mitigation address peering issues such as network latency, performance and security. With a demo of our express peering solution, supported by our Network Services Platform (NSP), Deepfield analytics and IP routing solutions, we will show how Nokia can help you take control of your peering edge.
{{my.Save the date}} <[[#]]> View the event page: Networking Field Day 20 <[[https://techfieldday.com/event/nfd20/]]> Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
